CHAT.comment: INV leaves the room.
mom pushes on top of computer box and it makes noise.
child pushes on sensor repeatedly and computer box beeps, and mom gasps and laughs repeatedly.
child touches sensor and it doesn't make noise, mom and child look at each other with surprise.
child sits on computer box and it makes noises.
child pushes sensors and it lights up but doesn't make noise.
child sits on computer box again.
computer box makes a loud noise.
child pushes on computer box and it makes noises.
child walks over to the table.
child sits in a chair at the table.
child gets up from the table and tries to look at her back.
child starts to play with the rubber door stop on the wall.
INV covers the computer box.
INV and child uncover the aquarium.
INV leaves the room.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child tickles mom's face with her hands.
child pulls on aquarium stand.
child walks over to the computer box.
child goes to door to leave.
child makes unintelligible noises.
child opens her mouth like she's going to bite, and mom does the same.
child walks toward mirror and is out of camera's view.
child walks back over to the aquarium.
child opens mouth wide and looks at self in the mirror.
child walks over to the mirror.
INV enters the room.
INV and child speak simultaneously.
INV covers the aquarium.
mom gets up from the blue chair, and child sits down.
mom covers her eyes with her hands and child does the same.
INV brings the degu in and sets the cage on the table.
INV leaves the room.
child sticks fingers in the cage.
child motions to open the cage.
child puts fingers in the cage.
mom talks to degu and makes clucking noise with her tongue to call it.
child makes clucking noises with her tongues.
child clucks tongue to show mom and mom imitates.
child stands on chair.
INV takes degu out of the room.
mom and INV laugh.
INV brings in the meerkat.
INV leaves the room.
child walks over to the aquarium.
mom taps meerkat's nose to child's nose.
child swings meerkat and hits mom.
child swings meerkat at mom again.
child runs over to play with the rubber door stop on the opposite wall.
child comes back to the table.
mom moves meerkat to chair and speaks for meerkat.
mom makes meerkat hop across the table away from the child.
mom keeps moving meerkat across the table while making noises and child chases after it and laughs.
child begins to make screaming noises and mom hands the meerkat to the child.
child throws the meerkat to mom and mom uses it to dance and makes sound effects.
mom keeps pulling the meerkat away and never quite gives it to child.
child runs to the door.
mom ducks behind meerkat and talks for meerkat.
mom pushes meerkat across the table.
mom pushes meerkat across the table while making sound effects and child laughs.
child throws meerkat in the air to mom.
mom slides meerkat across while making sound effects and child laughs.
child tries to throw the meerkat but it hits the table.
child throws meerkat again and it hits the table.
mom talks for meerkat.
mom slides meerkat across the table and mom and child laugh.
child throws meerkat to mom.
mom and child throw and slide meerkat back and forth between them and they both laugh.
INV takes meerkat from the room and mom and child leave for the bathroom.
mom and child are sitting at the table, and child sneezes.
child walks over to the aquarium.
INV enters the room and puts the robodog on the floor.
child picks up the robodog and puts it on the table.
child puts robodog on the floor.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child demonstrates how the robodog wags its tail.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom whistles and child makes noises to attract robodog's attention.
child picks robodog up and places it more in the middle of the room
mom whistles to the robodog.
child picks up robodog and places it back down again.
mom makes motion to touch the robodog.
robodog opens it's mouth.
INV enters the room.
INV takes the robodog out of the room because the battery is dead.
child goes over to the rubber door stop again.
INV enters the room and brings in the robodog.
INV leaves the room.
child picks up robodog to examine it.
child pushes button on robodog's back.
child looks underneath robodog.
child pushes button on robodog's back.
child picks up robodog and spins it in a circle.
child moves robodog to change its direction.
INV enters the room.
child hands INV the robodog.
INV leaves the room.
INV enters the room.
INV puts the car on the table and leaves the room.
child runs back over to the rubber door stop.
child runs back over to the table.
child begins playing with the door stop again.
child turns to see if mom is playing with the car, and child runs back to the table.
child takes the car from the table and puts in on the couch.
child leaves couch and goes back to the door stop.
child laughs as mom makes sound effects and they push the car back and forth.
child pushes car and it flips onto its side.
child pushes car underneath couch.
child rolls car under the couch.
